SEARCH
Package com.hexaware.payxpert.model

Class Tax

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.payxpert.model.Tax
public class Tax extends Object
The Tax class represents tax-related information for an employee in a specific tax year. It contains details such as tax ID, employee ID, tax year, taxable income, and tax amount.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tax

      public Tax()
      Default constructor for the Tax class.

    • Tax

      public Tax(int taxID, int employeeID, int taxYear, double taxableIncome, double taxAmount)
      Parameterized constructor to create a Tax with specific details.
      Parameters:
      taxID - The unique identifier for the tax record.
      employeeID - The unique identifier for the associated employee.
      taxYear - The tax year for which the tax is calculated.
      taxableIncome - The taxable income of the employee.
      taxAmount - The amount of tax calculated for the employee.
